homepage: http://www.fivestarproduction.co.th/เจ้าสาวของอานนท์/
original_title: เจ้าสาวของอานนท์
overview: Arnon, young and good looking engineer, propose to every girls he met. He is assigned to check machine at coconut field in rural. He meets with a tomboy, Suchada. At first, he do not like her. After he finds that tomboy is a girl, he gradually tries to win her heart.
title: Bride of Arnon
